mapper.sql: eqmtMgt.eqmt_mgt_id AS eqmtMgtId, eqmtMgt.eqmt_mgt_nm AS eqmtMgtNm, IFNULL(eqmtMgt.day_target, 1) AS dayTarget, workInfo.prod_work_start AS prodWorkStart, workInfo.prod_work_end AS prodWorkEnd, workInfo.prod_work_qty AS prodWorkQty, workInfo.routing_id AS routingId FROM prs_work_info workInfo INNER JOIN bc_equipment_mgt eqmtMgt ON workInfo.eqmt_mgt_id = eqmtMgt.eqmt_mgt_id WHERE prod_asm_id = #{prodAsmId}
